name: xernerx-example-bot-js
description: A javascript example bot for the xernerx framework.
author: Dummi

scripts.start: npm i && npm link xernerx && npm fund && nodemon
scripts.framework: npm run extensions && npm rm xernerx && npm update --force && npm start
scripts.database: npm run extensions && npm i xernerx && npm rm xernerx-database && npm update --force && npm link xernerx-database && npm start
scripts.language: npm run extensions && npm i xernerx && npm rm xernerx-language && npm update --force && npm link xernerx-language && npm start
scripts.commands: npm run extensions && npm i xernerx && npm rm xernerx-commands && npm update --force && npm link xernerx-commands && npm start
scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m "Version Patch"  && npm version patch && git push
scripts.minor: git add . && git commit -m "Version Upgrade" && npm version minor && git push
scripts.major: git add . && git commit -m "Version Rewrite" && npm version major && git push
